tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to exposure of `Authorization` and `Cookie` headers via error logging: under certain failure paths the application logs request headers without redaction, causing sensitive credentials (e.g., bearer tokens and session cookies) to be written in plain text to logs. An attacker or any party with access to those logs could use the leaked values to impersonate users or escalate privileges.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `error_tracker` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Generation of Error Message Containing Sensitive Information
